description: I know a lot of people are worried & are saying Trump will use the military to force vaccines on us, but that is simply not true. He said he might use the military to distribute them to those who WANTED them. He also said they are working on other solutions which many people seem to look past. The Great Awakening rides entirely on the public’s level of awareness & by letting this play out, the public is becoming more aware & pissed off than ever before - which is a good thing. Trump has put the traitors on a pedestal to **** themselves in the court of public opinion. And a lot can change in 6 months. With declas / Obamagate starting, the conversation may be entirely different. Remember when people were freaking out & saying Trump wants to enact red flag laws & take our guns? Yeah, how did that one turn out?.... All I’m saying is that we are witnessing the greatest intelligence operation this world has ever seen, fighting the worst evil on the face of this planet, & nobody knows the entire details of the plan except for the hidden identities of those operating the plan. If you’re scared about something, pray. Ask God for some clarity - because ultimately He is in control. Have faith my friends, I think this entire conversation will be different in the not so distant future.
